nodes.text: Garren was a boy who lived on Cularin during the Clone Wars.

Garren's father worked in a cloud city, while his mother worked afternoons at a factory. He was a member of Borus's Boys, a street gang that liked to hang out near Gadrin Dump. However, he was captured by Task Force Vermin, a Thaereian military unit that was tasked with kidnapping children on Cularin.
